member.name: T:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData
member.summary: The captured data which can be passed to the logger. Implementations can transform this by passing a user defined delegate to the logging configuration returning a new Object that will be logged.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData.Timestamp
member.summary: The formatted timestamp of the log event. The default format is the number of seconds to 3 decimal places since the unix epoch time. It can be overridden by specifying a format string to the configuration option. and

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData.CategoryName
member.summary: The category of the Logger that created this log event. This is the value passed to .

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData.Scope
member.summary: The stack of logging scopes that led up to this logging event. For this to be populated then must be true.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData.Level
member.summary: The that this event was logged with.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData.Event
member.summary: The that this event was logged with.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData.Message
member.summary: The message that this event was logged with.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData.Exception
member.summary: The , if any, that was logged alongside this event.

member.name: T:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkEndpoint
member.summary: Describes which Splunk HEC endpoint to use.

member.name: F:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkEndpoint.Json
member.summary: Use the services/collector/event endpoint

member.name: F:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkEndpoint.Raw
member.summary: Use the services/collector/raw endpoint

member.name: M:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddSplunk(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder)
member.summary:
Adds a Splunk HTTP Event Collector logger named 'Splunk' to the factory using the specified configuration.
The Json event endpoint, default payload structure and options from the existing Configuration will be used.
member.param: The to use.

member.name: M:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddSplunk(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,System.Action{ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions})
member.summary:
Adds a Splunk HTTP Event Collector logger named 'Splunk' to the factory using the specified configuration.
The Json event endpoint and default payload structure will be used.
member.param: The to use.
The delegate that configures the LoggerFactory.

member.name: M:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddSplunk(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,System.Func{ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData,System.Object})
member.summary:
Adds a Splunk HTTP Event Collector logger named 'Splunk' to the factory using the specified configuration.
The Json event endpoint and options from the existing Configuration will be used.
member.param: The to use.
The delegate that returns an object to pass to the event end point. Is the endpoint type is the object is serialized as Json, if then is called.

member.name: M:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddSplunk(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkEndpoint)
member.summary:
Adds a Splunk HTTP Event Collector logger named 'Splunk' to the factory using the specified configuration.
The default payload structure and options from the existing Configuration will be used.
member.param: The to use.
The splunk endpoint type to use, Raw events are only supported in Splunk Enterprise 6.4.0, Splunk Light 6.4.0 and later as well as Splunk Cloud.

member.name: M:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddSplunk(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkEndpoint,System.Action{ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions})
member.summary:
Adds a Splunk HTTP Event Collector logger named 'Splunk' to the factory using the specified configuration.
The default payload structure will be used.
member.param: The to use.
The splunk endpoint type to use, Raw events are only supported in Splunk Enterprise 6.4.0, Splunk Light 6.4.0 and later as well as Splunk Cloud.
The delegate that configures the LoggerFactory.

member.name: M:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddSplunk(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkEndpoint,System.Func{ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.LogData,System.Object})
member.summary:
Adds a Splunk HTTP Event Collector logger named 'Splunk' to the factory using the specified configuration.
The options from the existing Configuration will be used.
member.param: The to use.
The splunk endpoint type to use, Raw events are only supported in Splunk Enterprise 6.4.0, Splunk Light 6.4.0 and later as well as Splunk Cloud.
The delegate that returns an object to pass to the event end point. Is the endpoint type is the object is serialized as Json, if then is called.

member.summary: Adds a Splunk HTTP Event Collector logger named 'Splunk' to the factory using the specified configuration.

member.name: T:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Splunk HEC Logging Provider, a Log Provider for the framework.

member.name: M:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default values are used.

member.name: T:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.ChannelIdOption
member.summary: Specifies where, if at all, to include the channel identifier in the query to the endpoint.

member.name: F:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.ChannelIdOption.None
member.summary: No channel Id will be sent

member.name: F:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.ChannelIdOption.QueryString
member.summary: Channel Id will be sent in the query string

member.name: F:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.ChannelIdOption.RequestHeader
member.summary: Channel Id will be sent in the request header

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.IncludeScopes
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to include scope information for log events. The default value is false.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.SplunkCollectorUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the Url for the splunk collector.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.AuthenticationToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the HEC authentication token.
member.remarks: This must be specified. See for more information.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.UseAuthTokenAsQueryString
member.summary: Gets or sets indication to use or not hec token authentication at query string.
member.remarks: Only applicable for Splunk Cloud. See for more information.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout (in milliseconds) used for http HEC requests when sending data to the Splunk instance. The default value is 1500.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.CustomHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets any custom header to be applied at HEC calls.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.ChannelIdType
member.summary: Gets or sets where, if at all, to include the channel identifier in the query to the endpoint. The default value is

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.Host
member.summary: The host value to assign to the event data. This is typically the hostname of the client from which you're sending data.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the index by which the event data is to be indexed. The index you specify here must within the list of allowed indexes if the token has the indexes parameter set.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source value to assign to the event data. For example, if you're sending data from an app you're developing, you could set this key to the name of the app.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.SourceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the sourcetype value to assign to the event data

members.member:
The format string used to format the timestamp within the . The default value of null will result in the number of seconds to 3 decimal places since the unix epoch time being used. Any other format string here will be passed to the method.
and

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.BatchInterval
member.summary: The frequency, in milliseconds, with which to try and send events to the HEC endpoint. A value of 0 will only result in sends when greater than events have been collected. The default value is 1000.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.BatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the . Once items are collected they will be sent regardless of time till the next . Also, The maximum number of items to send in a single batch. The default value is 50.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.SplunkLoggerOptions.Fields
member.summary: Gets or Sets any explicit custom fields to be defined at index time. Requests containing the "fields" property must be sent to the , or they will not be indexed.

member.name: T:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.Utils.NullExternalScopeProvider
member.summary: Scope provider that does nothing.

member.name: P:ColeSoft.Extensions.Logging.Splunk.Utils.NullExternalScopeProvider.Instance
member.summary: Returns a cached instance of .
